verses.roman:
vidyāra auddhatye kāhoṅ nā kare gaṇana
sakala paṇḍita jini' kare adhyāpana

synonyms: vidyāra auddhatye—because of pride in education; kāhoṅ—anyone; nā—does not; kare—do; gaṇana—care; sakala—all; paṇḍita—learned scholars; jini'-conquering; kare—does; adhyāpana—studies.
translation: By dint of pride in His education, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, not caring for anyone else, defeated all kinds of learned scholars while executing His studies.
